fig.label: Fig. 49.4

caption.p: (A) Delayed-type hypersensitivity skin test responses to tuberculin in Peruvian children before (control) and after the onset of measles. (B) Peripheral blood mononuclear cell proliferation in response to phytohemagglutinin from rhesus macaques during a primate center outbreak of MV.

fig.attrib: Figure reproduced from Griffin DE. Measles virus-induced suppression of immune responses. Immunol Rev 2010;236:176–89 ©2010 John Wiley & Sons A/S.
